weapon_description: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.
weapon_skill_description: Gain "Ode to Flowers" after Normal or Plunging Attacks hit an opponent: DEF increases by 16% and gain a 20% All Elemental DMG Bonus for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can trigger once per 0.1s. When this effect reaches 2 stacks or the 2nd stack's duration is refreshed, increase all nearby party members' All Elemental DMG Bonus by 16% for every 1,000 DEF the equipping character has, up to a maximum of 51.2%, for 15s.
